achievements.name: Novice gravedigger
achievements.description: Buried your first body.

achievements.name: Advanced gravedigger
achievements.description: Buried 10 bodies.

achievements.name: Shovel master
achievements.description: Buried 50 bodies.

achievements.name: First slice
achievements.description: Got your first slice of meat. Smells a little strange, but looks like ordinary meat...

achievements.name: Sashimi master
achievements.description: Made 30 slices. You've got the perfect size slice pretty much down.

achievements.name: His house
achievements.description: Upgraded the church.

achievements.name: His mansion
achievements.description: Upgraded the church for the second time.

achievements.name: A fish a day!
achievements.description: Caught 6 different types of fish. One fish for every day!

achievements.name: Fish collector
achievements.description: Caught 10 different types of fish.

achievements.name: Ichthyologist
achievements.description: Caught 15 types of fish! You know everything about fish. They feel uncomfortable about it...

achievements.name: Brutal fisherman
achievements.description: Caught 200 fish. Your name is used to terrify misbehaving fish larvae.

achievements.name: Gold fish
achievements.description: Got a gold fish. Want to make a wish?

achievements.name: Kitchen boy
achievements.description: Cooked 10 different dishes or drinks.

achievements.name: Cook
achievements.description: Cooked 20 different dishes or drinks.

achievements.name: Chef
achievements.description: Cooked 30 different dishes or drinks. You can call yourself a Chef now.

achievements.name: Dream dinner
achievements.description: Made a gold-star dinner.

achievements.name: Tastes like home
achievements.description: Ate a fish stick. It reminded you of home...

achievements.name: Apprentice
achievements.description: Discovered 5 alchemy recipes. You're getting to know how things work in the lab.

achievements.name: Alchemist
achievements.description: Discovered 10 alchemy recipes. Just remember, the Philosopher's Stone is a lie.

achievements.name: Master alchemist
achievements.description: Discovered 20 alchemy recipes. Now it's time to buy a white van and drive into the desert.

achievements.name: Health care
achievements.description: 50 health potions. -- And all of them red!

achievements.name: MacPlayer
achievements.description: There can be only one.

achievements.name: Not far from the ground
achievements.description: Dungeon level 5 cleared!

achievements.name: Scary dungeon depths
achievements.description: Dungeon level 10 cleared!

achievements.name: Nothing underneath
achievements.description: Dungeon level 15 cleared!

achievements.name: Golden pumpkin
achievements.description: Harvested a gold-star pumpkin.

achievements.name: Winemaker
achievements.description: Made a gold-star wine.

achievements.name: Old Astrologer
achievements.description: Met Astrologer. He's wise and tired of everything, even life.

achievements.name: Charm itself
achievements.description: Met Ms Charm. There's something about this woman that you can't understand.

achievements.name: Wealthy merchant
achievements.description: Met Merchant. He's always ready to do business. Except around dinner time.

achievements.name: Holy Inquisition
achievements.description: Met the Lord Inquisitor. An unwavering kind of guy. You definitely wouldn't want to be his enemy.

achievements.name: Sweetheart Bishop
achievements.description: Met Bishop. His motto - Pray, preach, and look like you won the lottery.

achievements.name: Summon a chicken
achievements.description: Snake summoned a chicken. Well... it's a start. Better than nothing.

achievements.name: Side quest
achievements.description: You killed a Vampire Hunter. In life, there are no side quests.

achievements.name: Simple but stylish
achievements.description: Decorated a Dark Shrine. Looks better than your first apartment!

achievements.name: Not a hot dog
achievements.description: Sold burgers at the burning ceremony. It's a mystery why you didn't make hotdogs.

achievements.name: Match 3
achievements.description: Collected three dark organs. Three in a row! The Inquisition is going to get a prize!

achievements.name: Night watch
achievements.description: Got rid of the guardsmen's ambush. Now you are the Witch Hill Keeper too!

achievements.name: Perfume
achievements.description: Gave some perfume to Ms Charm. It smells nice, and wasn't tested on animals.

achievements.name: Ideal song
achievements.description: Got an Ideal Song from Vagner. Now you know how you'll make a million bucks, once you get back home.

achievements.name: Graveyard Veggies
achievements.description: Started a company with Merchant. A great name for a successful company!

achievements.name: On every shelf
achievements.description: Your company achieved 5 Fame. When you want quality vegetables -- you go to the graveyard!

achievements.name: Best seller
achievements.description: Gave a gold-star book to Astrologer. You should consider writing six more...

achievements.name: Even here
achievements.description: Fixed the garden. You'll spend a lot of time here...

achievements.name: Stone fence
achievements.description: Built a stone fence around the graveyard. Your graveyard is well protected now.

achievements.name: Marble
achievements.description: Got the marble quarry ready. Marble is better than stone.

achievements.name: A perfect gift
achievements.description: Gave a skull to Astrologer. A skull makes a nice present indeed!

achievements.name: The Mill
achievements.description: Fixed the mill. No further need to grind everything by hand.

achievements.name: A book with funny pictures
achievements.description: Gave the Necronomicon to Snake. Hope nobody uses it as cookbook!

achievements.name: Bridge builder
achievements.description: Fixed the bridge. Whatever else happens, you'll always be remembered as a great bridge builder!

achievements.name: Just green points
achievements.description: Collected 1000 green points. They do not decay at midnight. So that was easy.

achievements.name: Just blue points
achievements.description: Collected 1000 blue points. They do not decay at midnight. So that was easy.

achievements.name: Just red points
achievements.description: Collected 1000 red points. They do not decay at midnight. So that was easy.

achievements.name: More green points!
achievements.description: Collected 3000 green points. Ok. Now that's impressive.

achievements.name: More blue points!
achievements.description: Collected 3000 blue points. Ok. Now that's impressive.

achievements.name: More red points!
achievements.description: Collected 3000 red points. Ok. Now that's impressive.

achievements.name: Shady Snake
achievements.description: Met Snake. He seems dangerous. You get why everybody calls him Snake.

achievements.name: Landlord
achievements.description: Bought your first land in the Village. By cheating a sick and helpless old man.

achievements.name: Talking Skull
achievements.description: Built the tavern. Horadric wishes you were dead now.

achievements.name: Good skull
achievements.description: Your tavern's quality is 20! Wow!

achievements.name: Well-known skull
achievements.description: Your tavern's quality is 40! Double Wow!

achievements.name: Epic skull
achievements.description: Your tavern's quality is 80! Ultra Wow!

achievements.name: Employee of the month
achievements.description: Yorick became your bartender. For no salary. Slavery? No, he's made of wood!

achievements.name: First party
achievements.description: Threw your first alco-party. The guests remember nothing, but they enjoyed it.

achievements.name: Open mic
achievements.description: Put on your first Comedy Show. The guests laughed on command, so everything went good.

achievements.name: Locking up the sun
achievements.description: Put on your first concert. Ms. Charm's fans fell into ecstasy and a brawl broke out.

achievements.name: Rat race
achievements.description: Organized your first rat race. The winning rat got a giant piece of cheese, choked on it, and died.

achievements.name: Best party
achievements.description: Threw an excellent alco-party. It's time to open the local drunk tank.

achievements.name: Best mic
achievements.description: Put on an excellent Comedy Show. It can't be -- the guests didn't have to be commanded to laugh!

achievements.name: Best concert
achievements.description: Put on an excellent concert. Ms. Charm received a marriage proposal from each male spectator.

achievements.name: Best race
achievements.description: Organized an excellent rat race. Two guests lost everything and drowned themselves.

achievements.name: The show must go on
achievements.description: Organized 15 events. You're a natural-born event manager!

achievements.name: Forward to the past
achievements.description: Used the archaeological time machine for the first time. And didn't go mad.

achievements.name: An unexpected guest
achievements.description: Met marquis Teodoro Jr. An aristocrat in danger - what could be more profitable!

achievements.name: Vampires in the Village
achievements.description: A vampire is terrorizing the villagers? Solution: an army of carnivorous bees.

achievements.name: The face of the enemy
achievements.description: Exposed the vampire. Time to play Van Helsing!

achievements.name: To stop an Ancient Curse
achievements.description: Alaric convinced you to help. Refusal would have been dangerous to your health.

achievements.name: One more inquisitor
achievements.description: Met lady Beatrice. Technically, you resisted her charms. But in your imagination...

achievements.name: Blood supplier
achievements.description: Brought corpse blood to the vampire. Not very tasty, but better than many popular diets!

achievements.name: Mysterious woman
achievements.description: Watched a scene from the past. Nothing is clear but it's quite intriguing...

achievements.name: Awkward interrogation
achievements.description: Interrogated vampire Carl, leaving Carl greatly enlightened.

achievements.name: Lesser evil
achievements.description: Lady Beatrice made you an offer you can't refuse. Unless you decide to refuse.

achievements.name: Revolution begins
achievements.description: It's your last chance to join the workers and peasants. To be more specific, the donkeys and rats.

achievements.name: Cook of Revolution
achievements.description: You've helped the revolutionaries. Let's spread donkey communism across the world!

achievements.name: Writer of Revolution
achievements.description: You've helped the revolutionaries again. They'll be hard pressed to hang you as a "dirty exploiter".

achievements.name: Ideologist of Revolution
achievements.description: You've helped revolutionaries a third time. Who is next in line for General Secretary?

achievements.name: Camp
achievements.description: Now you have your own camp! And hundreds of potential enemies -- in the form of Inquisitors.

achievements.name: Developed camp
achievements.description: You've improved your camp. The chances that the refugees will die of starvation got lower.

achievements.name: Strengthened camp
achievements.description: You've provided the camp with some fortifications. They look dubious, but the settlers like them.

achievements.name: Paradise
achievements.description: Your camp is flawless. You should write a guide to camp management!

achievements.name: Raccoon thyroid stew
achievements.description: The cook has recovered her peace of mind. Now her friends won't avoid obesity and gastritis.

achievements.name: Beheaded horse
achievements.description: You helped the undertaker deal with her dead husband's relatives. The funeral mass is soon.

achievements.name: More forest thugs
achievements.description: You provided the tanner's son with the bright and happy future of a forest thug. Nice work!

achievements.name: Strange delivery
achievements.description: Someone had to become the first client of the Donkey Express.

achievements.name: A locked ghost from the past
achievements.description: How could someone not be crazy after all this time?

achievements.name: A habitable room
achievements.description: Not a 5-star suite, but it will do.

achievements.name: A lost stained glass window
achievements.description: It belongs in the church.

achievements.name: The first session of curing therapy
achievements.description: Start Euric's treatment.

achievements.name: The second session of curing therapy
achievements.description: Continue Euric's treatment. He says he's feeling better. Probably.

achievements.name: The third session of curing therapy
achievements.description: The treatment is over, but Euric doesn't look so cured.

achievements.name: Dissatisfied villagers
achievements.description: The villagers are unhappy about something. Pray it's not your fault.

achievements.name: Help the villagers
achievements.description: They should be satisfied. At least for now.
